stanza.line: In loving thee thou know I am forswornforsworn

In act thy bed-vow broke and new faith torntorn
In vowing new hate after new love bearingbearing

For all my vows are oaths but to misuse theethee
And all my honest faith in thee is lostlost
For I have sworn deep oaths of thy deep kindnesskindness
Oaths of thy love thy truth thy constancyconstancy
And to enlighten thee gave eyes to blindnessblindness
Or made them swear against the thing they seesee
